publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2580 Mike Pringle: Renumbering of Committee Rooms—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to renumber the committee rooms at Holyrood into an order based on their location so as to avoid confusion for members of the public when attending committees and events and calls for better signage to the committee rooms so that they can be found more easily.
S2M-2580 Renumbering of Committee Rooms (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mike Rumbles*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2580 Renumbering of Committee Rooms (lodged on 14 March 2005) Karen Gillon*, Tommy Sheridan*, George Lyon*, John Swinburne*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2580 Renumbering of Committee Rooms (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mr David Davidson*

S2M-2580 Mike Pringle: Renumbering of Committee Rooms—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to renumber the committee rooms at Holyrood into an order based on their location so as to avoid confusion for members of the public when attending committees and events and calls for better signage to the committee rooms so that they can be found more easily. Supported by: Mike Rumbles, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Ms Sandra White, Tricia Marwick, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon, Tommy Sheridan, George Lyon, John Swinburne, Mrs Nanette Milne, Shiona Baird, Mr David Davidson, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2580 Renumbering of Committee Rooms (lodged on 14 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
